title: The Shaman Master
alternative_title: 关于我的神棍师父 / My Shaman Master
status: 关于我的神棍师父 / My Shaman Master
description:
Description :
        A youngster called Zhang Mo from the Northeast, who has been tormented by a curse since childhood, until a mysterious girl called Bai Zhizhi showed up, and wrecked his muddled jobless life. Under her threats, Zhang Mo ventured deep into the mountains, and awakened a mysterious man called Mu Cha who had been in slumber in Shek Pik (an area located along the southwestern coast of Lantau Coast, Hongkong). He then learned of a unprecedented world that is unlike the modern world, with the only choice of going along with two people of unknown origins who aspire to be shamans, to win a "battle" to rid of the curse, however...
My Shaman Master
